segments.text: I notice the water overflowing from the sink, creating a mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to see such waste and potential damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems completely unaware of what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't understand how she can be so oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being mischievous, taking cookies without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of annoyance at their behavior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is risking injury by standing on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around and sees what's going on soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel irritated by the lack of awareness in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
